thread.title: Xiaomi Mi 5 to be launched on July 16: Here’s what is expected
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Mi 5 to be launched on July 16: Here’s what is expected | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Xiaomi Mi 5 to be launched on July 16: Here’s what is expected
text:
Xiaomi has teased a new smartphone announcement on July 16 on Chinese social networking site Weibo. The device in question might well be the Mi 5 because quite a few leaks have taken place around the next flagship from Xiaomi.
According to a report on TechnoBuffalo , “The online invitation doesn’t reveal much, but it does offer what could be a first look at the Mi 5.” Based on the picture, people are speculating that this could be a metal frame and given that this is a flagship device from Xiaomi, it’s not too much of an expectation to have.
There had been lot of rumors around the announcement of Mi 5 and Mi 5 Plus. A Weibo account revealed complete specifications of Mi 5 last week.
According to the leaked information, the Mi 5 will feature a 5.2 inch Quad HD display, powered by a Snapdragon 810 SoC, 3000mAh to keep it running and might get 16MP rear shooter and 13MP up front.
The device is likely feature a new metal frame design, 2.5D curved edges and also introduce new MIUI based on Android Lollipop 5.1. TechnoBuffalo further reports, “It may cost around 2399 yuan in China.”

 13, 2015 10:32 am
